desc.title: Remotely working as part of Data Engineering Team.
Implement 3rd party system integration for JustGo that offers extensive membership management to allow the members to engage easily.
Ability to conduct complex data analysis with complex SQL queries and experience with enterprise web applications development.
Analyze & organize raw data, evaluate business needs, build data pipelines & maintain them and prepare data for predictive modeling.
Providing custom generated reports to provide data visualizations and produce new insights.
Collaborate with clients from the UK, USA, Europe, and Australia to identify and prioritize requirements and conduct feasibility studies.
Developed and optimized 100+ stored procedures, views, functions & style sheets and restructured schemas with 60+ tables.
Developed database model, REST API, Full-Text Search using Django Rest Framework, PostgreSQL, and Docker for Bhalogari.com website
Worked in Computer Vision based project "Vehicle Make & Model Recognition" that can identify the makers and models of cars from images using One Shot Learning
Received basic understanding of a project management tool, JIRA
Developed employee management system, a full-stack web application using React, Material UI, and Laravel.
Automatic River Encroachment Detection in Bangladesh using remote sensing data analysis and GIS processing
OmdenaLore-Giga: a combined UNICEF/ITU endeavor to locate school sites in Sudan using satellite imagery and connect every kid and school to the internet
Worked with the software development team to identify and prioritize software requirements gathered from the stakeholders.
Developed several web applications in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, and PHP.
Carried out feasibility analysis and determining connectivity to prepare detailed, technical, and operational documentation.
Hands on experience in configuring networks using equipment and components
Provided a Remotely diagnose faults from the office via remote access and customer liaison
Worked with copper and fiber optic cabling and switching systems.
Carried out feasibility exercises and determining connectivity to preparing detailed, technical and operational documentation.
A whole day tour in server room of BTCL
